name: Smash'Em (AlpacaMyGames)
description:
A small (primarily) Android and PC game, click and destroy style.

Your regular casual game to lose some time on, collect some wanted characters and to score some achievements. It's exciting, it's frustrating, it's simple.

Developed over a course of several months, as an after work side project.

Try it out, share ideas about what do add, how to improve, and if there will be time, maybe a second part will be released.

Thanks for checking it out!

The Alpaca

P.S. the Android version has some ads (mostly to test them out a bit), hopefully not to annoying.
